sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Musica Oxoniensis a collection of songs for one and two voices, with the thorough-bass / publish'd by Francis Smith and Peter de Walpergen ... Goodson, Richard, 1655-1718. Orpheus and Euridice. Selections. Weldon, John, 1676-1736. When charming Teraminta. De Walpergen, Peter. Smith, Francis, d. 1688.
[4], 12 p.
Printed by Leon. Lichfield ... and are to be sold by John Walsh ... and John Hare ... at his shop in ... London, Oxford : 1698.
Four songs by Goodson and Weldon. Another issue in 1698 with slightly different imprint. Cf. Day and Murrie, Songbooks; Wing S4028. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

Printed by Leon. Lichfield ... and are to be sold by John Walsh ... and John Hare ... at his shop in ... London, Oxford : 1698.
Four songs by Goodson and Weldon. Another issue in 1698 with slightly different imprint. Cf. Day and Murrie, Songbooks; Wing S4028. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
